Arcane Blast: R30' Ranged touch uses spell slot (level 1 minimum) to inflict 2d6 HP + 1d6 HP/slot level
Arcane Spell Failure: 10%
Dimensional Steps: May teleport 600'/dy
Elemental Spell (Acid): May convert half or all spell damage to acid damage; uses +1 spell slot
Elemental Spell (Fire): May convert half or all spell damage to fire damage; uses +1 spell slot
Heighten Spell: May cast chosen spell at a higher level
Magical Knack: Gains +2 caster level (max 20) in chosen class
School Opposition (Divination): Casting Divination spells requires two spell slots each
School Opposition (Necromancy): Casting Necromancy spells requires two spell slots each
Scribe Scroll: May create scroll of any known spell
Shift: May use Dimension Door effects to move 50' 5/dy
Still Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out movement
Summoner's Charm: Unlimited summoning duration
